cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 3rd Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 3rd Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: This is a female only dorm! Spacious 6 bed dorm room with 3 bunk beds and high quality mattresses. Each bed includes lockable locker, private reading light and power point. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Private single room with 1 extra long (92x203cm) single bed with high quality mattress, 32in; high definition LED TV, wardrobe and study desk. Clean and modern bathrooms are located just down the hall on each level.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
